subject: fix: simplify web scroll preservation with DOM-based approach
body:
Replace fragile pixel-based scroll restoration with message ID anchoring:
- Add data-message-id attribute to MessageBubbleWeb for DOM queries
- Use scrollIntoView({ block: 'end', behavior: 'instant' }) for reliable positioning
- Remove triple requestAnimationFrame timing hack
- Capture anchor message ID before loading, restore after loading completes

This eliminates timing races and makes scroll preservation height-independent.
